message.body: So its just us then, huh? Well, in response to your last ?, i'm a pretty meat & potatoes sorta guy. Dont go in for all that ethnic crap. Montezuma's revenge!
I like all kinds of food. Are you home now from your trip?
Yep! Home & trying to sort out my life. This is the longest ive ever been away, so a lot of catching up to do. And ive gotta find some work asap! You working?
Not working today, just doing some house cleaning, etc
What sort of work do you do when youre not busy cleaning house?
Industrial electrician. I work in power plants, factories, mines, military bases, etc, all the backbones of this great land of ours.
